title.text: Extracting Distinctive Features of Swine (H1N1) Flu through Data Mining Clinical Documents

entities.text: Extracting Distinctive Features of Swine (H1N1) Flu through Data Mining Clinical Documents

abstractContent.text: Early recognition of distinguishing patterns of a novel pandemic disease is important.
We introduce a methodological approach based on popular data mining techniques to extract key features and temporal patterns of swine (h1n1) flu that is discriminated from swine flu like symptoms.

introductionContent.text: Early recognition of a novel pandemic is desirable to minimize its dissemination.
However, it usually spends sometime in developing a diagnostic test and people tend to omit the test for various reasons including cost, which leads to late recognition.
Under these circumstances, symptoms and signs in clinical documents might be valuable indicators to have a population perspective on pandemic severity.
In this paper, we propose a methodological approach to extract features of swine(h1n1) flu distinctive to swine flu like patients' one.
